content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace at position (46.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at position (46.0, -82.0)
- Wooden chest at position (47.5, -81.5) collecting iron plates from the furnace
Use-case: Processes iron ore into iron plates. The structure now integrates a collection point (wooden chest) for iron plates from the furnace, facilitating direct resource storage and management.

ERROR TIPS

### Errors due to insufficient production output and delayed processing
- Verify that the processing cycle receives adequate time to complete so that sufficient outputs are available.
- Adjust timing or processing cycles to ensure production output meets extraction requirements.

### Errors when inserting items despite resource unavailability
- Confirm that the inventory contains the intended resource prior to attempting insertion.
- Double-check inventory levels to prevent actions using absent resources.

### Errors when extracting items from an entity lacking sufficient output
- Ensure the target production structure has sufficient output before extraction.
- Validate that the extraction target contains the intended resource, and avoid extraction attempts when inventories are low.
